00040 #include "RunnableInterface.hpp"
00041 #include "../Logger.hpp"
00042 #include <cassert>
00043 
00044 namespace RTT {
00045     using namespace base;
00046 
00047     RunnableInterface::~RunnableInterface() {
00048         if ( this->owner_task && this->owner_task->isRunning() ) {
00049             Logger::In in("~RunnableInterface()");
00050             log(Critical)
00051             <<"Activity still running, but RunnableInterface destroyed! Stop the task"
00052             " before deleting this object. Crash may be imminent."<<endlog();
00053         }
00054         if ( this->owner_task )
00055             this->owner_task->disableRun(this);
00056     }
00057 
00058     RunnableInterface::RunnableInterface() : owner_task(0) {}
00059 
00060     void RunnableInterface::loop() { this->step(); }
00061 
00062     bool RunnableInterface::breakLoop() { return false; }
00063 
00064 
00065     bool RunnableInterface::hasWork() {
00066         return false;
00067     }
00068 
00069     void RunnableInterface::setActivity( ActivityInterface* task ) {
00070         if (owner_task) {
00071             // notify old owner he's out.
00072             owner_task->disableRun(this);
00073         }
00074 
00075         owner_task = task;
00076     }
00077 
00078     os::ThreadInterface* RunnableInterface::getThread() const {
00079         if (owner_task)
00080             return owner_task->thread();
00081         return 0;
00082     }
00083 
00084 }
